document_data.mainbody:
Meggin (
Meggin was a woman in her mid-twenties sporting fiery red hair. She ran the Ships Prow in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
Meggin won the inn during a high-stakes game of Three-Dragon Ante. She ran it for a couple years until the drow Xzandre Hsylran killed her circa the  and proceed to impersonate her using a hat of disguise.
